dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: 1 Wall Street Analyst Thinks Apple Is Going to $325. Is It a Buy Around $250?
News Content: 1 Wall Street Analyst Thinks Apple Is Going to $325. Is It a Buy Around $250?

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: -1, Prediction of stock price falling: -1
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

{
"reasoning": "The news headline suggests a positive outlook for Apple Inc. with a Wall Street analyst predicting the stock price to reach $325, which is higher than the current price of around $250. This prediction, combined with the previous predictions from other models showing a majority predicting a rise in stock price, indicates a bullish sentiment. The consistency in predictions across different models, with most predicting a higher probability of the stock price rising, further supports this positive outlook. Therefore, based on this analysis, the probability of the stock price rising is estimated to be higher than the probability of it falling.",
"company_name": "Apple Inc.",
"company_symbol": "AAPL",
"news_headline": "1 Wall Street Analyst Thinks Apple Is Going to $325. Is It a Buy Around $250?",
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.72,
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.28
}
